programme.desc: Eight kid gamers, ages eight to twelve, battle it out in ten different Roblox games to win prizes and find out who is the ultimate gamer! Video gamer, football star, and children’s book author Rashad Jennings hosts!

programme.title: Baby Einstein - World of Rhythm
programme.desc: Your little one will want to keep a beat, snap his fingers and march his feet! Join new characters Pillie, the musical woodpecker, and Coco, the dancing cockatoo, and share the excitement of rhythm with your baby. World of Rhythm explores rhythm in music, rhythm in nature and rhythm as a form of expression.

programme.title: Kids' Planet - Confidence, Honesty, and Integrity - EP118
programme.desc: In this episode, we will discover the values of confidence, honesty and integrity. We will learn that we build trust by fulfilling the promises we make to others. Honesty means telling the truth, which also shows respect for others. We will understand that having integrity means that in addition to being honest, we also choose to do what is right.

programme.title: Mellodees - Take Me Out To The Ball Game - EP13
programme.desc: Batter Up! Dee and friends take the field to play a fun game of baseball.

programme.title: Sunny Bunnies: Get Busy - Sunny Bunnies: Get Busy Ep7 - EP107
programme.desc: In a new spin-off series of mini-episodes - ‘Sunny Bunnies Get Busy’ - the characters are on hand to entertain and engage viewers in various colourful and creative activities and inspire children to 'Get Busy'.

programme.title: Giselle and the Green Team - The Case of the Poisonous Pollen - EP204
programme.desc: Gisele and her Green Team fight to stop Nick Slick from planting genetically modified corn.

programme.title: Rainbow Rangers S2 - Team Rainbow Rangers! / Wingin' It - EP215
programme.desc: The Rangers have to stop a factory from pouring rainbow colour in the river; the Rangers help a physically-challenged duckling fly, so it can catch up with its migrating flock.

programme.title: Thomas Edison's Secret Lab - Zero Chemistry / Von Dropout - EP110
programme.desc: When the kids catch Von Bolts "crying," they build a robot girlfriend to keep him company, but the robot is too advanced and the kids have to play cupid if they're going to get them together. / Von Bolt, feeling underappreciated and overused, quits the team to find himself and a lot of trouble.

programme.title: Secret Millionaires Club - A Gift Shop Too Far - EP110
programme.desc: With a few comedic twists and turns, Gisele helps the Secret Millionaire's Club save an orangutan rehabilitation sanctuary in Indonesia.

programme.title: Superhero Kindergarten - Checkmate - EP119
programme.desc: Mr. Arnold's special guest, Arnold Schwarzenegger, has an epic chess match against Natasha Badinski.

programme.title: Shaq's Garage - To Catch a Truck - EP111
programme.desc: Shaq's special painting is stolen, It's up to the Shaq Paq to find the thief and recover the work of art.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Zexal - Flipping Out: Part 1 - EP5
programme.desc: The story takes place in the distant future and focuses on a boy named Yuma Tsukumo, the number one bad boy at his school. Something unexpected happens when Ryoga challenges him to a Duel as the mysterious ghost of Astral appears before them, a new legend begins.

programme.title: Kidaverse Roblox Rumble - Kidaverse Roblox Rumble Ep10 - EP10

programme.title: Baby Einstein - Animals Around Me - EP101
programme.desc: Set off on a fun-filled "field trip" with your baby to discover animals found at the park, on the farm, and in your own backyard.

programme.title: Kids' Planet - Sports - EP119
programme.desc: In this episode, we will travel through the wonderful world of sports. We will learn the physical and mental benefits of practising a sport or physical activity. We will talk about the value of perseverance, training, and the importance of knowing how to win and how to lose. We will learn about different sports and disciplines and how to show respect to our opponents.

programme.title: Mellodees - Monster Mash - EP14
programme.desc: Trick-or-Treat! Grab your costume and don't forget your dancing shoes for Dee's Halloween smash.

programme.title: Sunny Bunnies: Get Busy - Sunny Bunnies: Get Busy Ep8 - EP108
programme.desc: In a new spin-off series of mini-episodes - ‘Sunny Bunnies Get Busy’ - the characters are on hand to entertain and engage viewers in various colourful and creative activities and inspire children to 'Get Busy'.

programme.title: Giselle and the Green Team - The Case of the Watery Diversion - EP205
programme.desc: Gisele and her Green Team fight Nick Slick from building a dam to illegally move water downstream.

programme.title: Rainbow Rangers S2 - Whale of a Tale / Construction Destruction - EP216
programme.desc: Heavy boat traffic disrupts a migrating whale and her calf; the rangers must find a way to keep the whales safe.

programme.title: Thomas Edison's Secret Lab - Mutant Mascot / Freaky Furry - EP111
programme.desc: When their new guinea pig mutates into a big furry monster, the kids seek a way to revert the effect, and find the answer in genetics. / When a freak accident causes Angie to switch bodies with her dog, Skeezer falls hard for the “new Angie” while the “old Angie” goes rabid with frustration!

programme.title: Secret Millionaires Club - The Final Financial Frontier - EP111
programme.desc: The SMC are going into space? At least, Radley's experiment is. But first, they have to solve the financial crisis of Rocket, Inc., pass astronaut tests, and make a "special delivery" to the ISS.

programme.title: Superhero Kindergarten - Checkmate - EP119
programme.desc: Mr. Arnold's special guest, Arnold Schwarzenegger, has an epic chess match against Natasha Badinski.

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Being an ‘only lamb in the flock’ Timmy has been used to getting his own way. Now for the first time Timmy is going to have to learn to get along with other little animals. Timmy is going to Nursery! Self-willed and naughty Timmy is going to have to learn how to share things with other youngsters and think about their feelings – not just his. Timmy is a gifted little footballer who needs to learn that it’s not enough to kick the ball – you have to pass it too. Harriet Heron and Osbourne Owl, who run the Nursery are going to have their hands full, but Timmy gets it right in the end with a little help from his friends of the furry, feathery and spikey type.

programme.title: Misha, the Purple Cat
programme.desc: Misha is a very lively, alert cat. She is very interested in investigating everything going on around her, which means she has some very entertaining adventures with her friends. Timmy is a gifted little footballer who needs to learn that it’s not enough to kick the ball – you have to pass it too. programme.title: Birth of a Champion
programme.desc: In 1984 Germany, a hot-headed teenage Boris Becker has but one goal: to play tennis in the big leagues, and to be the best at it. Despite his temper, he is scouted by coach Günther Bosch, who sees the future Wimbledon champion for what he is.

programme.title: Lemonade
programme.desc: Mara, a young Romanian mother, is a caretaker in the US on a temporary visa. Life seemed perfect after she got married and brought her son over. However, she faces abuses of power from the officer in her green card process, who seeks to exploit her plight.

programme.title: Submission
programme.desc: Lúcia is raped by her husband and presses charges against him. In her quest for justice, she must battle her husband who is the son of the State's Vice Attorney, and the Portuguese legal system with its patriarchal beliefs.

programme.title: A Wedding
programme.desc: Zahira, eighteen years old, a Belgian-Pakistani girl wants to keep the baby growing inside her. Amir, her brother and confidant, promises to help her. But the parents have other ideas for the young girl.

programme.title: Toubab
programme.desc: Soon after being released from prison, Babtou gets in trouble with the law again. Facing deportation to his foreign birthplace he’s never been to, he and his friend Dennis are willing to do anything to stay in the only home they've ever known: Frankfurt.

programme.title: Red Eagle
programme.desc: A Summit between France, England, Portugal and the Pope is to take place in Spain, under the guise of looking for a solution to the conflict between Spain and Portugal; but the ulterior motive is to attack the Kingdom of Spain.

programme.title: Not My Type
programme.desc: A dashing philosopher is sent off to teach in a quiet northern town, where he soon falls for a bubbly and rather vulgar local hairdresser. But will the couple’s carnal affection manage to overcome their irreconcilable differences?

programme.title: Here And There
programme.desc: Returning from the US, Pedro comes home to his family in Mexico. With the money he has made, he hopes to secure a better life with his family, mend his relationship with them, and hopes to achieve his lifelong dream of starting a band.

programme.title: A Murder Of Crows Jealousy
programme.desc: Inspector Bruhl is investigating the abduction of a young boy from a playground, until evidence suggests that the boy doesn’t exist at all. Is he a figment of the alleged mother’s fractured reality, or are answers buried in her traumatic past?

programme.title: Just Like A Woman
programme.desc: Two women travel from Chicago to Santa Fe to escape their suffocating lives. Marilyn dreams of winning a contest held by a famous belly dancing company, while her friend, Mona, has a darker secret.

programme.title: Sleepless Night
programme.desc: A cop with a connection to the criminal underworld finds his secret life exposed when he and his partner are caught stealing cocaine from a powerful drug dealer, a move that puts his son's life in jeopardy.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Cement
programme.desc: After waking in a hospital with no memory, Sarah Kohr is accused of shooting an innocent man following a violent accident. Determined to clear her name, she sets out to uncover the truth of what really happened that night.

programme.title: Mammal
programme.desc: Margaret (Rachel Griffiths), a silently grieving divorcee forms an intense bond with Joe (Barry Keoghan), a homeless youth. Their oedipal relationship is threatened by the wrath of Margaret’s ex-husband and Joe’s involvement with a gang of violent youths.

programme.title: Clementine
programme.desc: A Victorian painting of a pair of twins has been a prominent attraction for decades. But, when one twin mysteriously disappears from the artwork, the other is then forced to leave the comfort of their painting and journey through the gallery to find her.

programme.title: The Policeman is a Tiger
programme.desc: After getting into an accident on his motorcycle on the expressway, a youth is interrogated by a police officer. Through the protagonist’s eyes, we see the officer represented as a tiger whose questions and lectures betray a seeming familiarity.

programme.title: SAF
programme.desc: Desperate, Kamil takes a low wage job in Istanbul's urbanization project. In so doing, he displaces a Syrian refugee and partakes in his neighborhood’s destruction, while also needing to pay for the required permits. One day, Kamil suddenly disappears.
